entry.summary: 分析：美国第一个 100% 核能比特币矿场诞生 能否可持续发展？美国首个承载比特币挖矿服务的核动力数据中心宣告正式建成。这一事件使得核能挖矿再次进入了人们的视野。早期核能挖矿在东欧即开始投入。核能在多数时间都可提供大量稳定的电力输出，利于矿机平稳运行。阅读全文：https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UyfUUeL_RsVL2y2sJQmK2g

entry.summary:
Labor market cooling
Guy Berger: 1/ @LinkedIn Hiring Rate update: February was unfortunately a month of bad news: The US LHR was down 6.5% M/M seasonally adjusted, the biggest 1 month decline since 2020. Hiring is now down 30.8% from April 2022 (when declines began), and 27.9% Y/Y. https://t.co/nMd3IRfPpS
